<style>
    .header-container {
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        width: 100%;
        padding: 15px 30px;
        position: fixed;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1000;
    }

    .header-content {
        max-width: 1400px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .logo-container {
        flex: 0 0 auto;
    }

    .logo-image {
        height: 60px;
        width: auto;
        transition: transform 0.3s ease;
    }

    .logo-image:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
    }

    .nav-container {
        flex: 1;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: flex-end;
    }

    .nav-list {
        list-style: none;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        display: flex;
        gap: 40px;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .nav-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-weight: 600;
        padding: 8px 0;
        position: relative;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    }

    .nav-link:after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        width: 0;
        height: 2px;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        background-color: #00FF00;
        transition: width 0.3s ease;
    }

    .nav-link:hover:after {
        width: 100%;
    }

    /* Dropdown Styles */
    .dropdown {
        position: relative;
    }

    .dropdown-content {
        display: none;
        position: absolute;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        min-width: 220px;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.15);
        border-radius: 4px;
        border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.2);
        top: 100%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        padding: 8px 0;
        opacity: 0;
        transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1002;
    }

    .dropdown:hover .dropdown-content {
        display: block;
        opacity: 1;
    }

    .dropdown-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        padding: 12px 20px;
        display: block;
        font-size: 15px;
        font-weight: 500;
        text-align: left;
        white-space: nowrap;
        transition: all 0.2s ease;
    }

    .dropdown-link:hover {
        background-color: rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        padding-left: 25px;
    }

    .submenu {
        left: 100%;
        top: -8px;
        transform: none;
    }

    .dropdown:hover > .dropdown-content.submenu {
        display: block;
    }

    /* Mobile Menu Toggle */
    .menu-toggle {
        display: none;
        background: none;
        border: none;
        cursor: pointer;
        padding: 5px;
        margin-left: 10px;
        z-index: 1003;
    }

    .menu-toggle span {
        display: block;
        width: 25px;
        height: 3px;
        margin: 5px 0;
        background: #00FF00;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
    }

    /* Responsive Styles */
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
        .nav-list {
            gap: 30px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 10px 20px;

        }

            transition: max-height 0.5s ease;

            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: flex-start;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 20px;
            gap: 15px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 16px;
            width: 100%;
            display: block;
            padding: 10px 0;
            position: relative;
        }
        /* Remove underline animation for mobile */
        .nav-link:after {
            display: none;
        }
        /* Add explicit plus indicator for dropdowns */
        .dropdown > .nav-link:before {
            content: '+';
            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00FF00;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown.active > .nav-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        .dropdown-content {
            position: static;
            width: 100%;
            transform: none;
            border: none;
            box-shadow: none;
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            opacity: 1;
            display: block;
            padding: 0;
            margin-left: 15px;
            transition: max-height 0.3s ease;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        .dropdown.active .dropdown-content {
            max-height: 1000px;
            padding: 8px 0;
        }
        .dropdown-link {
            padding: 10px 15px;
            position: relative;
        }
        /* Style submenu dropdowns in mobile */
        .dropdown-content .dropdown > .dropdown-link {
            padding-right: 30px; /* Space for plus indicator */

        .dropdown-content .dropdown > .dropdown-link:before {

            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;

            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown-content .dropdown.active > .dropdown-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        /* Fix submenu position */
        .submenu {
            position: static;
            margin-left: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 8px 15px; /* Reduce padding for smaller screens */
        }
        .header-content {
            flex-direction: row;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
        .logo-image {
            height: 45px;
        }
        .nav-container {
            top: 62px; /* Adjust based on header height */
        }
        /* Better spacing for dropdown items */
        .dropdown-content {
            margin-left: 10px;
        }
        .dropdown-link {
            padding: 12px 10px;
        }
    }

    /* Add margin to page content to prevent header overlap */
    body {
        padding-top: 90px;
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        body {

        }

<!-- JavaScript for Mobile Menu -->
<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const menuToggle = document.querySelector('.menu-toggle');
        const navContainer = document.querySelector('.nav-container');
        const dropdowns = document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown');
        
        // Toggle mobile menu
        menuToggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
            navContainer.classList.toggle('active');
            // Prevent body scrolling when menu is open
            document.body.style.overflow = navContainer.classList.contains('active') ? 'hidden' : '';
        });
        
        // Handle dropdowns on mobile
        dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
            const link = dropdown.querySelector('.nav-link, .dropdown-link');
            link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
                    if (dropdown.classList.contains('dropdown') && 
                        dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-content')) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        e.stopPropagation(); // Prevent event bubbling
                        
                        // Close other same-level dropdowns
                        const parentUl = dropdown.parentNode;
                        const siblings = parentUl.querySelectorAll(':scope > .dropdown');
                        siblings.forEach(sibling => {
                            if (sibling !== dropdown) {
                                sibling.classList.remove('active');
                            }
                        });
                        
                        dropdown.classList.toggle('active');
                    }
                }
            });
        });
        
        // Close menu when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (window.innerWidth <= 768 && 
                !navContainer.contains(e.target) && 
                !menuToggle.contains(e.target) && 
                navContainer.classList.contains('active')) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
        
        // Update menu behavior on window resize
        window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 768) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
                    dropdown.classList.remove('active');
                });
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
    });
</script>

            --text-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            --box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            --transition: all 0.3s ease;
            --bg-light: #f8f9fa;
            --text-primary: #2c3e50;
            --text-secondary: #505c6c;
        }

        body {
            font-family: 'Source Sans Pro', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: var(--text-primary);
            background-color: var(--bg-light);
        }

        .initiative-banner {
            background: var(--white);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            padding: 4rem 1rem;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }

        .banner-content {
            max-width: 1000px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
            opacity: 0;
            animation: fadeIn 1s ease-out forwards;
        }

        .banner-image {
            max-width: 500px;
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            margin: 0 auto 3rem;
            display: block;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
            border-radius: 8px;
            transform: translateY(20px);
            opacity: 0;
            animation: slideUp 0.8s ease-out forwards;
        }

        .banner-title {
            font-size: clamp(2rem, 5vw, 3rem);
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            color: var(--navy-primary);
        }

        .memorial-section {
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 3rem auto;
            text-align: left;
            padding: 0 1.5rem;
            background: var(--white);
            border-radius: 12px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
            padding: 2.5rem;
        }

        .memorial-title {
            font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
            font-size: clamp(2rem, 4vw, 2.5rem);
            color: var(--navy-primary);
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            text-align: center;
            letter-spacing: -0.5px;
            line-height: 1.2;
        }

        .memorial-subtitle {
            font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 400;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
            text-align: center;
            font-style: italic;
            letter-spacing: 0.5px;
        }

        .memorial-text {
            font-size: 1.125rem;
            line-height: 1.8;
            margin-bottom: 1.8rem;
            color: var(--text-primary);
            letter-spacing: 0.2px;
        }

        .quote-block {
            font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
            font-style: italic;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            margin: 2rem 0;
            padding: 1.5rem 2rem;
            border-left: 3px solid var(--red-primary);
            background: rgba(191, 10, 48, 0.03);
            border-radius: 0 8px 8px 0;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        .call-to-action {
            text-align: center;
            margin: 3rem 0 2rem;
            font-size: 1.4rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: var(--navy-primary);
            padding: 1rem;
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 128, 0.1);
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 128, 0.1);
        }

        .action-items {
            margin: 2.5rem 0;
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            line-height: 2.2;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
        }

        .action-items br {
            content: "";
            display: block;
            margin: 0.8rem 0;
        }

        .final-message {
            font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
            font-size: 2rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-align: center;
            color: var(--navy-primary);
            margin-top: 3rem;
            padding: 2rem 0;
            letter-spacing: 0.5px;
            border-top: 2px solid rgba(0, 0, 128, 0.1);
            transform: translateY(20px);
            opacity: 0;
            animation: slideUp 0.8s ease-out 0.5s forwards;
        }

        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }

        @keyframes slideUp {
            from {
                transform: translateY(20px);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                transform: translateY(0);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }

        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .initiative-banner {
                padding: 5rem 2rem;
            }

            .memorial-section {
                padding: 3.5rem;
            }

            .quote-block {
                margin: 3rem -2rem 3rem 0;
                padding: 2rem 3rem;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 767px) {
            .memorial-section {
                padding: 2rem 1.5rem;
                margin: 2rem 1rem;
            }

            .banner-image {
                margin-bottom: 2rem;
            }

            .memorial-title {
                font-size: 1.8rem;
            }

            .memorial-subtitle {
                font-size: 1.2rem;
            }

            .quote-block {
                margin: 2rem -1rem;
                padding: 1.5rem;
            }
        }

        @media print {
            .initiative-banner {
                background: #fff !important;
                color: #000 !important;
                box-shadow: none;
            }

            .memorial-section {
                box-shadow: none;
                padding: 0;
            }

            .banner-image {
                max-width: 400px;
                box-shadow: none;
            }
        }

        /* Hover effects */
        .memorial-section {
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }

        .memorial-section:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
        }

        /* Accessibility improvements */
        @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
            .banner-content,
            .banner-image,
            .final-message,
            .memorial-section {
                animation: none;
                transform: none;
            }
        }

        /* High contrast mode support */
        @media (prefers-contrast: high) {
            :root {
                --navy-primary: #000;
                --red-primary: #800;
                --text-primary: #000;
                --text-secondary: #333;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="initiative-banner" role="banner">
        <div class="banner-content">
            <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/msgsndr/d2BYZGOF7ecSj21A0t4N/media/67f0228e28ec4ccbf50b8915.jpeg" alt="Don't Wait - Do It Now Initiative" class="banner-image">
            
            <div class="memorial-section">
                <h2 class="memorial-title">Why "Do It Now"?</h2>
                <h3 class="memorial-subtitle">In memory of Matthew Keenan</h3>
                
                <p class="memorial-text">
                    Matthew Keenan was more than a friend — he was the heartbeat of Emerald Owl Productions. As our Vice President and Head Laser Technician, he poured passion into every show, every project, and every connection. He brought light — literally and figuratively — to every experience he worked on.
                </p>
                
                <p class="memorial-text">
                    In 2023, Matthew's life was tragically cut short in a car accident — one that was 100% not his fault. He was simply in the wrong place at the wrong time, and the world lost someone extraordinary.
                </p>
                
                <p class="memorial-text">
                    In the days that followed, we kept hearing the same words:
                </p>
                
                <div class="quote-block">
                    "I wish I had told him..."<br>
                    "I regret not saying..."
                </div>
                
                <p class="memorial-text">
                    The Do It Now initiative was born from that ache — and that love.
                </p>
                
                <div class="call-to-action">
                    This card is a reminder to act on the things that matter.
                </div>
                
                <div class="action-items">
                    To say "I miss you."<br>
                    To say "Thank you."<br>
                    To say "I love you."<br>
                    To say "I'm sorry."<br>
                    <br>
                    To call or write the person you've been thinking about.<br>
                    <br>
                    To take the leap.<br>
                    <br>
                    To say the words — now, while you still can.<br>
                    <br>
                    To live and love like there's no time to waste.
                </div>
                
                <div class="final-message">
                    Don't wait. Do it now.
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

Our Story Our Team Gallery Blog Careers Do It Now Initiative - Emerald Owl Productions Why "Do It Now"? In memory of Matthew Keenan Matthew Keenan was more than a friend — he was the heartbeat of Emerald Owl Productions. As our Vice President and Head Laser Technician, he poured passion into every show, every project, and every connection. He brought light — literally and figuratively — to every experience he worked on. In 2023, Matthew's life was tragically cut short in a car accident — one that was 100% not his fault. He was simply in the wrong place at the wrong time, and the world lost someone extraordinary. In the days that followed, we kept hearing the same words: "I wish I had told him..." "I regret not saying..." The Do It Now initiative was born from that ache — and that love. This card is a reminder to act on the things that matter. To say "I miss you." To say "Thank you." To say "I love you." To say "I'm sorry." To call or write the person you've been thinking about. To take the leap. To say the words — now, while you still can. To live and love like there's no time to waste. Don't wait. Do it now. The Safest Experience in the Sky Why Are Laser Shows the Safest Option for Entertainment? ✓ Environmentally Friendly No debris, smoke, or chemical residue - just pure light entertainment ✓ Weather Resilient Shows go on in various weather conditions, reducing last-minute cancellations ✓ Noise-Friendly Silent operation perfect for sensitive communities and wildlife Learn More About Laser Show Safety → 🔒 All our shows are fully compliant with FDA regulations and operated by certified technicians Unique Benefits of Hosting a Laser Show Transform your event into an unforgettable experience Customizable & Scalable Perfect for any scale - from intimate gatherings to major festivals. Fully tailored to your event's theme and goals. Cost-Effective Add extra shows or nights at minimal cost. Perfect for fundraising events and multi-day festivals. Versatile Integration Works perfectly as a standalone event or enhances existing performances with live music and entertainment. Sponsorship Opportunities Engage sponsors with brilliant laser projections of logos and brand messages, creating unique promotional opportunities. Discover All Benefits → 💡 Contact us to learn how we can customize a laser show experience for your specific needs LASER SHOW PRICING Laser shows are unique entertainment options where you need details to get an accurate quote. Different needs and budgets can be accommodated, scaling the spectacle up or down. To discuss a laser show for your event, call us at 252-764-7628 without any sales pressure. During the call, we'll discuss your objectives, desired show type (beam, graphic or combo), venue specifics, anticipated audience size, sound and power requirements, location, whether it’s a solo event, customized music needs, and your budget. Our talented programmers design shows to music and offer package deals for multi-night events, reducing the cost per night significantly. One-time shows are pricier due to fixed overheads, but shared packages or revenue-split events can make them more affordable. At Emerald Owl Productions, we aim to find the right balance for a memorable laser show experience within your budget—multiple nightly shows also hardly impact the price. Once we have the initial details, future planning becomes simpler. We strive to overcome pricing challenges and bring your event to life, so let's collaborate!
